title: Embroidery Fragment, 10th–12th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain weave with satin and couching stitches
description: Tan linen ground embroidered with heavy tan linen thread and blue and yellow silk. Design arranged in horizontal bands of geometric, plant-like and animal forms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Fragment, 10th–12th century. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain weave with satin and couching stitches. 1939-11-22.
